EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Utilities Moderniz.-Email-EUW STD-T00284.Email 01-
EmailTemplate.subject: Communications innovation for new business models at EUW 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Navigate your way to a next-generation utility Save the date (EUW 2018: 6-8 November) We invite you to come join us to see how a cognitive, adaptive grid architecture of communications and grid intelligence boosts control, innovation and new business models.
Discover how:
- analytics applications can help you maximize value from your processes, people and assets. - about trans-continental test lab capabilities, from the University of Strathclyde and Nokia, that can help you effectively manage transformation risk and tune new technologies to your business. - more on the latest innovations in communication solutions that enhance the integration and management of renewable energy.
At EUW 2018, learn how to navigate your path as a next-generation utility with greater automation and new business model opportunities.
Meet us at booth A.a16! Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
